title: BetFuryScams
author: BetFuryScams
created_time: July 19, 2022, 03:14:45 PMLast edit: July 19, 2022, 07:14:48 PM by BetFuryScams
content: Betfury booongo rebrand scam What happened:: I have played at betfury for over a year and only had good things to say about them. I mainly played booongo slots and a number of the slots have a feature that progressively builds and when it is maxed out it can randomly trigger the bonus. I have built up a number of the slots to be full on the high stakes. I should also point out that betfury had a booongo tournament in may where potentially many other people have potentially done the same. Without notice all the booongo slots have been rebranded and all the bet history has been lost. I spoke to betfury support and they originally stated the slots did not do this, then that it doesnâ€™t remember from session to session (it does) I was promised the history would be restored. Anyway you can read the chat screenshots and see for yourself. For some reason I canâ€™t get the screenshots to show in the thread but the links are there and in the right order.Scammers Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=2848599Reference Link: www.betfury.io Amount Scammed:  potentially thousandsPayment Method:  multiple cryptoProof of Payment:  https://iili.io/wSYFEl.md.pngPM/Chat Logs: Here they admit to rebranding the slothttps://postimg.cc/ZCrrqcZxHere they state that the bonus rounds are not lost? Surely if it could remember this state it could remember the progress and history of building the bonus.https://postimg.cc/8svvyHFgHere I show that the history has gone. https://postimg.cc/zLPhQ2S8https://postimg.cc/yJN9vCRLhttps://postimg.cc/Y4V4RGMShttps://postimg.cc/N9HKzsjkhttps://postimg.cc/R3jFfkL6Here they try to gaslight me that this isnâ€™t even a feature and I prove it to them.https://postimg.cc/d78dK1zDhttps://postimg.cc/s1CHQNy4https://postimg.cc/f3XFnczXThen they try and gaslight me again saying it doesnâ€™t save from session to session. https://postimg.cc/sBNXHWf3https://postimg.cc/N5c0nBt2https://postimg.cc/PLPfDqW9https://postimg.cc/nXdV9tBTHere they say that the provider changes the slots and they have no control over it, as far as I can tell nowhere else has changed this slot, they also promise me here that my history will be returned but itâ€™s still not. https://postimg.cc/K4FWRHDhhttps://postimg.cc/njGsvHVRhttps://postimg.cc/w345Yb6tAdditional Notes:  This uses to be my main casino and apart from this issue I would have recommended them to anyone. The games already have an house edge without them pulling dirty unannounced tricks like this.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: I'm not sure that I understood best where your loss is here. Why is playing history so important here?QuoteAmount Scammed: potentially thousands.what potentially and where exactly is the scam here?you posted a lot of chat screenshots (it's good that they can't be shown, what would this thread look like), can you single out the most important ones, it's very tiring to open them one by one.

comments.author: BetFuryScams
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on July 19, 2022, 03:26:10 PMI'm not sure that I understood best where your loss is here. Why is playing history so important here?QuoteAmount Scammed: potentially thousands.what potentially and where exactly is the scam here?you posted a lot of chat screenshots (it's good that they can't be shown, what would this thread look like), can you single out the most important ones, it's very tiring to open them one by one.Because as you play some of the games, it builds up a meter that can trigger the bonus. This meter stays at the level you have built during each session. So when they changed provider this progress was reset to 0. I was promised by support this history would be restored and now Iâ€™m told it wonâ€™t be. This effects 100s of players not just me. The whole chat is there for clarity.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: although I agree that they should have at least informed their gamblers that they would change game providers for some of their slots, I don't think any scam actually happened. I understand OP's frustration but I don't believe you have a scam case here, sorry.anyway, some of the screenshots you shared are the same. check the bottom part of the links you shared.

The moment I saw all the links of the images I passed out ðŸ¤£OP needs an executive summary of his topic or there are slight chance to get any attention. It not necessary to use bold text too.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: BetFuryScams on July 19, 2022, 03:35:46 PMBecause as you play some of the games, it builds up a meter that can trigger the bonus. This meter stays at the level you have built during each session. So when they changed provider this progress was reset to 0. so here is just another complaint about not winning a potential bonus. I believe that everyone knows that bonuses are not an obligation of any casino, and they create them at will and cancel them when they want or think they are no longer needed.OP, unfortunately for you, there are no elements of fraud here. you can only pretend that this casino is not fair and they don't have bonuses worth paying attention to.

The slot has been rebranded and the bonus works the same just everyoneâ€™s progress was reset.
